examples.example: 我们应该时刻怀着感恩之心，感谢生活赐予我们的一切美好。

translate.english: We should always keep a grateful heart and thank life for all the good things it has given us.

examples.example: 我衷心感谢所有帮助过我的人，让我能不断进步。

translate.english: I sincerely thank all the people who have helped me, allowing me to keep making progress.

examples.example: 我要衷心感谢我的父母，他们给予我无尽的爱和支持。

translate.english: I want to sincerely thank my parents, who give me endless love and support.
